name: 3 Layer Garlicky Veg Biryani
description: A 3 layer garlicky veg biryani. Packed full of delicious vegetables and spices and topped with fresh cilantro. Serve with hot Raita. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 2 cups basmati rice cooked until almost done

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat 1 tablespoon oil and add all the spices.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, heat 1 tablespoon oil and add all the spices.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the spices on medium heat for 4-5minutes until they start giving out an aroma
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the spices on medium heat for 4-5minutes until they start giving out an aroma

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chopped onions and garlic and cook for 5 minutes until brown
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chopped onions and garlic and cook for 5 minutes until brown

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the cauliflower, carrots and beans and cook for another 5-6 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the cauliflower, carrots and beans and cook for another 5-6 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in some salt and green peas and cook covered for 3-4 minutes or until veggies are almost done.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in some salt and green peas and cook covered for 3-4 minutes or until veggies are almost done.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash rice and keep soaked for half an hour. Drain and cook in boiling water for 6-7 minutes or rice is almost done. Add in some salt while the rice is cooking.
recipeInstructions.name: Wash rice and keep soaked for half an hour. Drain and cook in boiling water for 6-7 minutes or rice is almost done. Add in some salt while the rice is cooking.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mix warm non dairy milk or water and saffron strands and keep aside for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl, mix warm non dairy milk or water and saffron strands and keep aside for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix this milk in one part cooked rice.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix this milk in one part cooked rice.

recipeInstructions.text: In the remaining half rice, add a teaspoon of red chili powder and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In the remaining half rice, add a teaspoon of red chili powder and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the base layer using the chili rice.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the base layer using the chili rice.

recipeInstructions.text: Top that layer with cooked veggies.
recipeInstructions.name: Top that layer with cooked veggies.

recipeInstructions.text: The saffron infused rice will be the top layer.
recipeInstructions.name: The saffron infused rice will be the top layer.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the dish with aluminium foil and bake in pre-heated oven at 350 degrees F for half an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover the dish with aluminium foil and bake in pre-heated oven at 350 degrees F for half an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve hot with Raita!
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve hot with Raita!
